content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex
- Burner mining drill at (-15.0, -50.0) connected to wooden chest at (-14.5, -48.5)
- Stone furnace at (-14.0, -47.0)

### Iron Smelting Area
- Stone furnace at (0.0, 0.0)
- Stone furnace at (2.0, 0.0)
- Stone furnace at (4.0, 4.0)
- Stone furnace at (6.0, 4.0)

### Automation Science Pack Production Line
- Assembling machine at (24.5, 4.5)
- Input chest at (21.5, 4.5) containing iron plates
- Output chest at (27.5, 4.5) containing copper plates and science packs
- Burner inserters at (22.5, 4.5) and (26.5, 4.5) connecting chests to assembler

### Power Generation System (Under Construction)
- Steam engine at (-5.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-2.0, 23.5)
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Multiple pipe groups connecting components:
  - Water pipe system at (-6.5, 21.5)
  - Steam pipe system at (-7.5, 15.5)
  - Main pipe network at (-6.5, 19.5) connecting various components

### Research Area
Multiple labs positioned across the map, currently not powered

### Electrical Distribution
Electric pole network spanning from (-1.5, 18.5) to (31.5, 18.5), currently not energized

ERROR TIPS

### Pipe Placement Errors
- Check for existing entities before placing pipes - many attempts to place pipes where entities already exist
- Ensure terrain is suitable for pipe placement - some attempts to place pipes on unplaceable terrain (water)
- When connecting pipe systems, ensure proper spacing and no overlapping with existing structures

### Power System Issues
- Power network is not receiving electricity due to:
  - Boiler has no fuel
  - Steam engine not receiving steam
  - Incomplete or incorrectly connected pipe network

### Resource Management
- Ensure required fuel (coal) is available before attempting to insert into machines
- Keep track of inventory requirements for power generation system

### Entity Connection Issues
- Verify all fluid-carrying entities (boilers, steam engines, pipes) are properly connected in sequence
- Ensure proper spacing between components of the power generation system
